name: ActivityHD™ Macro Examples
body:
### Welcome to the ActivityHD™ Macro examples page
You can use our examples right from the page, or use them as a starting point to create your own macros.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with macros? [Contact support](https://www.nqativ.com/Contact-Us.aspx) and we'll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
